body:
Gradient is accumulated only in leaf Variables (i.e. parameters/created by the user). You can call `.retain_grad()` on `subVariable` if you want it to get `.grad` saved.

Note that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on [our forums](discuss.pytorch.org).
